Key Match Events: Jeffrey Vandersay took 6 wickets as Sri Lanka defeated India by 32 runs
Rohit Sharma top scored with 64 but Vandersay snapped him up to start India's collapse
Washington Sundar's three wicket-haul helped India to restrict Sri Lanka to 240/9 from 50 overs
Pre-Game Insights: India tour of Sri Lanka, 2024 - 2nd ODI
Jeffrey Vandersay's six-wicket haul helped Sri Lanka secure victory
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed disappointment after the loss
Jeffrey Vandersay praised his team's performance and his own bowling
Miscellaneous Highlights: Weather or pitch conditions affecting the match
Sri Lanka's captain Charith Asalanka and teammates celebrated the wicket of India's Washington Sundar
